ThingDef.Name: SNS_Pistol_GenI_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona stellar pistol
ThingDef.description:
An advanced pistol that shoots shoots plasma out of its barrel at high velocities. Its recoil is negligible and its accuracy is good compared to other pistols.

The stellar pistol is heavily used by ultra-rich Glitterworld military personnel, and is a common infantry weapon for Cosmic Empires.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: SNS_Rifle_GenI_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona stellar rifle
ThingDef.description:
A fully automatic rifle that propels plasma at high velocities, without producing any recoil whatsoever. Its plasma is the weakest of Stellar weapons, but its firerate is more than enough to compensate.

The Stellar rifle is heavily used by ultra-rich Glitterworld military personnel, and is a common infantry weapon for Cosmic Empires.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: SNS_Shotgun_GenI_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona stellar shotgun
ThingDef.description:
A highly advanced shotgun that fires a devastating clump of high-energy plasma projectiles that excel at destroying armor. While its range is unarguably terrible (as to be expected from a shotgun), its power and armor-shattering properties are more than enough compensation.

The stellar shotgun is heavily used by ultra-rich Glitterworld military personnel, and is a common infantry weapon for Cosmic Empires, especially in urban environments.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: SNS_Sniper_GenI_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona stellar sniper
ThingDef.description:
A highly advanced sniper that fires devastating high-energy plasma projectiles powerful enough to blow off limbs with singular shots, and still have enough energy left to blow off another. While it takes a while to charge and aim, it often can get the job done in just one shot.

The Stellar sniper is heavily used by ultra-rich Glitterworld military personnel, and is commonly used by low-class military snipers for Cosmic Empires.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: SNS_CosmicLance_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Handheld Cosmic Lance
ThingDef.description:
A weapon made of pure Cosmic Alloy, further supercharged with pure Cosmic Matter, the Handheld Cosmic Lance is a miniature version of the Cosmic Lance, a supermassive ship weapon. It charges slowly and takes a long time to cool down between shots, but is able to utterly devastate whatever its projectiles hit. Few things are able to withstand more than a single shot from the Lance.

While it excels at long range and extremely close range, it is highly inconsistent at medium ranges. Care should be taken with the Lance since its explosions can accidentially destroy things.

The full-sized ship weapon Cosmic Lance is both extremely rare and feared for its ability to devastate entire planets with just a few Cosmic Lances firing down from orbit, despite it needing a long time to cool down between shots.

This weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: SNS_EterniumLance_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona The EXARCH
ThingDef.description:
A weapon made of pure Eternium, this superweapon fires deadly Eternium at an incredibly rapid speed. Just like its precessor, its projectile will make short work of anything in its way, and something that suvives one shot probably won't survive the next.

Like the Cosmic Lance, it excels at long and close range but may be harder to use at medium range.

It is so dangerous that it should not be used anywhere near something valuable, since it can easily destroy entire colonies by itself.

Extreme care should be taken with the EXARCH since it can wipe out its user if said user shoots at a target that gets too close.

No, seriously. EXARCH projectiles will literally kill a CHARON suit user in two shots depending on suit quality.
